lines.text: Maybe they... set up the bullet as part of a magic ritual with the table!
Like, they made it so that the bullet would count as a sacrifice, so it'd hover in place over the circle!
Yeah, that happens sometimes- you put sacrifices over the circle, and they sorta glow and float...
Depends on the ritual, but it could've been one of those.
Didn't you say that table's practically blank, though? You sure a ritual like that was possible?
Uh... come to think of it, no, the glowy ones are usually on the complicated end.
Plus, that'd kill all the <c=#FF00FF>momentum,</c> so it wouldn't rebound anyway. Nuts.
